citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A written itinerary was not submitted by the licensee prior to exhibition with overnight travel. The licensee was in a travel
status at the time of inspection, and no itinerary was available or submitted for overnight travel. There was also an
incident on January 27, 2024, where a truck hauling zebras and camels caught on fire on the way to Fort Wayne, IN, to
participate in a circus. No animals were injured, but there was no itinerary submitted or available for review for that trip.
Failure to provide an itinerary prevents inspectors from conducting inspections to ensure the welfare of the animals
covered under the Animal Welfare Act.
A written itinerary shall be submitted no fewer than 48 hours in advance of any travel and shall contain complete and
accurate information concerning the whereabouts of any animal intended for exhibition at a location other than the
approved site. To be corrected from this day, 21 August 2024, forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.126(c) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A written itinerary was not submitted by the licensee prior to exhibition with overnight travel. The licensee was in a travel 
status at the time of inspection, and no itinerary was available or submitted for overnight travel. There was also an 
incident on January 27, 2024, where a truck hauling zebras and camels caught on fire on the way to Fort Wayne, IN, to 
participate in a circus. No animals were injured, but there was no itinerary submitted or available for review for that trip. 
 
Failure to provide an itinerary prevents inspectors from conducting inspections to ensure the welfare of the animals 
covered under the Animal Welfare Act. 
 
A written itinerary shall be submitted no fewer than 48 hours in advance of any travel and shall contain complete and 
accurate information concerning the whereabouts of any animal intended for exhibition at a location other than the 
approved site. To be corrected from this day, 21 August 2024, forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
